title: My friend got perma banned!!
body: alright, so the other day one of my good mates got perma banned, for trolling and feeding, i know, it annoyed the crap out of me becuase almost every 5th game or so he would give up and start trolling, but, i got over that, one of the things about my mate is, he has major anxiety and extremely bad derpression, he used League to get his mind off of things, but after he had been perma banned, even when he created a new account, he hasnt trolld since but hes been really really depressed, he never asked me to do this, i just feel so sorry for him and would do anything to get him happy again, unfortunately i doubt that you would bother unbanning his account, but i thought it was worth a try, hes been playing this game since early beta on other accounts that he has either forgotten or just lost, he sometimes doesnt even talk to me becuase hes just so depressed about his account, the other day he basically said to me he gave up, he was done, he couldnt go to league to help him out and he couldnt do anything about it because his account, had been banned, like i said, i would do basically anything to see him either get his account back or to be actually happy, thanks, a great fan of the game.

replies.body:
From what I am reading alright, he deserved it. I don't run my car into someone's house because I am "depressed" yes?

"every 5th game or so he would give up and start trolling"

So 20% of the time he is not playing like a normal human being. Well done Riot!

Please pass on my regards to your friend and let him know I am one of those players who will not miss him.

I have extreme anxiety and depression here. I leave my room maybe twice a day, leaving the house maybe once a week.
Still, I am perfectly civil in all of my League games.
If not having the oppurtunity to troll in a video game drives someone to remain depressed all day though, they really need psychological help, and I say that as someone who is one five times the anti-depressants as the average person with depression.

Basically though, having depression isn't valid reason to be a jerk. Anyone who insists that I am wrong in saying that is a person who I cannot fathom befriending.

Your friend's account wont be getting unbanned.

Fact of the matter is he acting in a way that ended up in a permaban, he deserved it.
League is not a place to take out your misfortunes in life, there are plenty of get help services where you can deal with depression, League is not one of them.

Everyday you log in you are agreeing to play by the Summoner's Code, your friend refused to do so and got what he deserved.

he has stopped though, he's been playing on one of his other accounts, and he hasn't had a game yet, no matter how bad he went, he wouldn't troll, he even said to me that he was done, with trolling, he didn't want to risk ever being banned again
But isn't that exactly what riot is trying to do by banning people?
They should just QUIT perma banning. You know people spent money on RP. It would just be a big waste of $$. So I hope Riot does something to fix it.
somehow I feel you're talking about you ? lol
nooooo, i am against trolling myself, i understand now that he wont be getting his account back, and i guess its just his bad luck

the fact that he hadn't been banned before this, i don't think its really that fair to just go, you've trolled a couple times, you're not allowed on this account any more, maybe a week ban or something, to really scare him, i think permanently banning someone isn't fair at this stage...

Every 5th game he trolled and exactly how many games has he played??? 

PRO TIP: Don't be an annoying kid.
derp...ression. oh ok. so he is a %%%%%%ed troll....good thing he cant play anymore unless he just goes and signs up for another account....its not hard.

imagine getting banned of league, because your power went out or something, ive had a couple times where ive had to leave because something has happened, like my internet has dropped out, or my power cut, or i just had to leave because family reasons, i never once got banned for any of those

As a matter of fact, I can totally relate to this, since my lol always had extremely unstable Internet and often disconnected in the middle of a game, but I did get banned a lot from them. What I don't get is that did your friend get his account perma banned right off the bat without any warnings or short term bans? Also I am actually jealous of your friend since he can at least play lol...
